00020 WorldInformation::WorldInformation(const WorldInformation& rhs) : time_(rhs.time_){
00021     this->markers_.reserve(rhs.markers_.size());
00022     BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject>& marker, rhs.markers_) {
00023         if(marker) {
00024             this->markers_.push_back(marker->clone());
00025         }
00026         else {
00027             this->markers_.push_back(boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject>());
00028         }
00029     }
00030 
00031     this->obstacles_.reserve(rhs.obstacles_.size());
00032     BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle>& obstacle, rhs.obstacles_) {
00033         if(obstacle) {
00034             this->obstacles_.push_back(boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Obstacle>(obstacle->clone()));
00035         }
00036         else {
00037             this->obstacles_.push_back(boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle>());
00038         }
00039     }
00040 
00041     this->robot_data_.reserve(rhs.robot_data_.size());
00042     BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::shared_ptr<RobotData>& robot, rhs.robot_data_) {
00043         if(robot) {
00044             this->robot_data_.push_back(boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<RobotData>(robot->clone()));
00045         }
00046         else {
00047             this->robot_data_.push_back(boost::shared_ptr<RobotData>());
00048         }
00049     }
00050 }

00092 const RobotData& WorldInformation::get_according_robot_data(boost::shared_ptr<RobotIdentifier> id) const {
00093     //TODO(martinah) maybe check if robot_datas_[id->id()] exists? (should exist!)
00094     return *(robot_data_[id->id()]);
00095 }
